C

checkAcross(String[][], String, int) - Static method in class ticTac
This method checks if the player currently going has won going across the board.
checkDiagonal(String[][], String, int) - Static method in class ticTac
This method checks if the current player has won by getting n in a row going down.
checkDown(String[][], String, int) - Static method in class ticTac
This method checks if the current player has won by getting n in a row going down.

E

errorHandlingRows(String) - Static method in class ticTac
This method makes sure that the users input of the amount of rows is a number.
errorHandlingSymbols(String) - Static method in class ticTac
Makes sure user inputted symbol has a length of 1 and makes sure it is not a number Uses an if and else if statement to check both conditions userSymbol.length() to check length converts symbol to ascii, makes sure it is not a number based on comparing ascii chars If the user’s symbol doesn’t follow the criteria, they are asked to input a different one

I

initBoard(int) - Static method in class ticTac
This method uses a for loop to initialized and populated a 2d String array of the inputted size for the tic tac toe game.
inRange(String[][], String, int) - Static method in class ticTac
Makes sure the spot selection of each player is valid Checks to make sure the spot is a number first by comparing ascii chars Comparing the value of the int, makes sure the spot is no less than 1 and no greater than the board’s size Makes sure the spot is not already taken by comparing to a list of spots already used

M

main(String[]) - Static method in class ticTac
Main method that calls upon all other methods, initiates the game, and asks for the user’s input using scanner.

P

playSymbol(String[][], String, String, int) - Static method in class ticTac
This method puts the user's symbol, into the designated spot on the board that they picked.
printBoard(String[][], int) - Static method in class ticTac
This method prints out the board on the screen from the 2s String array made by initBoard.

T

ticTac - Class in <Unnamed>
This is a program that runs a two player tic tac toe game, with the size of the board decided by the user It is a two player game, where players can decide their symbols and decide where they want to place it by inputting a number on the board.
ticTac() - Constructor for class ticTac
